message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this extraordinary opportunity to you. The product I have to offer is truly unique and holds immense value for those who appreciate its qualities. Given its significance, I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $9,500 for the product. This offer allows you to secure an item that could potentially be worth much more in the future, while also providing me with a fair return for my investment. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal.
